history.narrative: Law 5-13 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 5-158, which was referred to the Committee of the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 12, 1983 and April 26, 1983, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 4, 1983, it was assigned Act No. 5-27 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
